name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl Live wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the irradiated world of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl with this immersive live wallpaper for your Chrome new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the haunting atmosphere of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl to your browser and explore the dangers of the Zone every time you open a new tab. With eerie visuals set against the backdrop of the Chornobyl exclusion zone, this live wallpaper captures the chilling world of the game. From the radiation-soaked landscapes to the mysterious anomalies, every detail of the Zone is alive with danger and intrigue. Perfect for fans of the STALKER. franchise, this wallpaper is a must-have for those who crave adventure, suspense, and survival in a world where danger lurks at every corner.

Designed to enhance both aesthetics and functionality, this extension transforms your new tab into a gateway to the unsettling world of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2.

With the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl Live Wallpaper, your Chrome browser will transport you into a hauntingly atmospheric world where every moment is filled with suspense. Perfect for fans of post-apocalyptic survival and the eerie mystery of the Zone.
